products.title: Vibe Grey Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: This Vibe Grey Perfect Fit Blind, is a combination of our metal venetian blind and perfect fit frame to create an ideal blind for your UPVC windows and doors. No screws, no drilling - innovative fixings.

products.title: Vibe Silver Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: This Silver Trance Perfect Fit Blind, is a combination of our metal venetian blind and perfect fit frame to create an ideal blind for your UPVC windows and doors. No screws, no drilling - innovative fixings.

products.title: Vibe Grey
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure Vibe Grey Perfect Fit Roller Blinds from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Perfect Fit Roller Blinds online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:
Min Width: 350mm Max Width: 1400mm
 	Min Drop: 150mm Max Drop: 2000mm
 	Fabric Composition: Polyester
 	Guarantee: 12 Months
 	Controls: Tensioned system, move bottom bar to raise/lower blind.
